description: This file implements a React component for handling the OAuth callback for Confluence. It displays a success or error message based on URL search parameters, and redirects the user accordingly.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component wrapping the inner callback logic with a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles the OAuth callback logic, displays status messages, and redirects based on the OAuth result.
